author: AndrewLevin
body:
#### PR description:

Following up on the hypernews post

https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/met/684.html

I have applied the JER smearing to the Puppi MET that is stored in the NANOAOD.

#### PR validation:

I have tested that it runs and stores the expected values.
title: Smear Puppi MET
